events.message: The customer reported an accident involving their car and filed a claim to cover the damages sustained in the collision.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the details specifying vehicle involvement in a collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the case and assist the customer throughout the process.
The company sent an acknowledgment message to the customer confirming the receipt of their auto accident claim.
The agent requested additional evidence from the customer, including photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report.
The customer promptly submitted all required documents including photos and the official accident report as requested.
The investigation team began assessing the submitted evidence to verify the details and circumstances of the car accident.
The investigation concluded positively confirming the customer’s report and no discrepancies in the submitted documents.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer detailing the compensation amounts for vehicle repair costs.
The customer responded with appreciation for the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved following the customer’s acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
The payment to cover the repair costs was issued promptly to the customer’s designated bank account.
The claim case was closed successfully after full settlement and payment delivery were confirmed with the customer.
The case file was archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference related to the vehicle accident.
